short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find lowest book price on kobo.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you to find lowest book price on kobo.com. You will get a list of all available book prices listed in different countries. It will convert all prices to USD and sort them for your convenience. 

https://github.com/fotonmoton/koboprice?tab=readme-ov-file#dollar-kobo-price
